segments.text: The sink overflow is making such a nasty mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring down the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dish towel bunched up, plate shiny but pointless now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jar like animals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sis waiting with her paw out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen reeks of carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside seems clean and proper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's just gross potential for slips and breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, turn off that faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR
